txt.en: Thadúr has recently taken over a small farm to the north-west of Oatbarton. He has used some foul type of poison to infiltrate the farm and debilitate its residents. You must defeat him and his minions and foil his plot to poison the Shire.  \n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest will be cancelled if you leave the Northcotton Farm before completing it.</rgb>

Thadúr the Ravager has begun to settle into a farm near Oatbarton. He has begun preparations to release a powerful poison known as Darkthorn into the Shire's water. You must foil Thadúr's plans and defeat him and his minions.
